meanings.definition: In a manner that exhibits phototropism.
meanings.sent1: The plant grew phototropically towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The flowers turned phototropically towards the window.
meanings.sent3: The sunflower danced phototropically in the morning light.
meanings.sent4: The leaves reached phototropically for the sun's warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The tree branches stretched phototropically to catch every ray of sunshine.

meanings.definition: Relating to the growth or movement of an organism in response to light.
meanings.sent1: The phototropically inclined plant thrived in the sunny spot.
meanings.sent2: The phototropically sensitive cells reacted to the bright light.
meanings.sent3: The phototropically aware caterpillar followed the sun across the garden.
meanings.sent4: The phototropically influenced behavior of the plant amazed the botanist.
meanings.sent5: The phototropically guided roots explored every corner of the soil for light.
